userData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
yum update -y
yum install -y httpd24 php56 mysql55-server php56-mysqlnd
service httpd start
chkconfig httpd on
cd /var/www/html
aws s3 cp --no-sign-request s3://tomash-public/examples/php/index.php .
